basics.name: Samantha Jones
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Experienced software developer with a passion for developing innovative solutions that improve user experiences.

work.summary: Developed and maintained a web application for tracking customer orders and inventory using React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL.
highlights: Implemented real-time order tracking feature using WebSockets.
Optimized database queries to improve application performance by 30%.

work.summary: Developed and maintained a mobile application for managing personal finances using React Native and Firebase.
highlights: Implemented biometric authentication feature using Touch ID and Face ID.
Integrated third-party APIs to allow users to view their account balances from multiple financial institutions.

volunteer.summary: Assisted with daily operations of the shelter, including feeding and caring for animals, cleaning cages and kennels, and providing customer service to visitors.
highlights: Trained and mentored new volunteers on proper animal care techniques.
Organized and led fundraising events to support the shelter's mission.

volunteer.summary: Assisted with preparing and serving meals to homeless and low-income individuals in the community.
highlights: Developed strong relationships with regular guests and provided emotional support and resources to those in need.
Collaborated with other volunteers to improve efficiency and organization of kitchen operations.

volunteer.summary: Collaborated with local health organizations in Malawi to develop and implement community health programs focused on maternal and child health.
highlights: Designed and conducted community needs assessments to identify gaps in health services and resources.
Developed and delivered trainings to local health workers and community members on topics such as family planning, nutrition, and hygiene.
